content.rendered: Announcing our newest trip for the 2010 lineup: the 2 Day Advanced! It's Colorado whitewater rafting and camping at its very best. Combine the Numbers, Narrows and Browns Canyon for the most action-packed two days. Plus wilderness camping in the beautiful Browns Canyon. This trip makes for an incredible weekend getaway with family or friends. Read about the 2 Day Advanced and quote yourself here. Plus, with our current 20% rafting discount, you'll save $80 per person!
